items.title: Mexico Economy Narrowly Dodges Recession Amid US Trade Chaos
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- Mexico’s economy expanded slightly in the first quarter on a jump in agricultural output, allowing President Claudia Sheinbaum to avoid recession as she steers the nation through an unpredictable US tariff policy. items.title: Goldman Sachs : Announces Redemption of Floating Rate Notes due May 15, 2026
items.description: NEW YORK, NY, April 30, 2025 -The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. today announced that it will redeem all of the issued and outstanding Floating Rate Notes due May 15, 2026 on May 15, 2025 . The Notes...
